00043 void DelaunayTriangulationOSG::triangulate(PointCloud3D* pointCloud, ITriangleMesh* mesh, axis ignore) {
00044 
00045 //      if (mesh != 0) {
00046 //              delete mesh;
00047 //      }
00048 //      mesh = new TriangleMeshImplicit();
00049 
00050         osg::Vec3Array* points = new osg::Vec3Array;
00051         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < pointCloud->getSize(); ++i) {
00052                 points->push_back(osg::Vec3((float) ((*pointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].getX()),
00053                                 (float) ((*pointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].getY()),
00054                                 (float) ((*pointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].getZ()))); //NOTE: possible BUG fixed here
00055         }
00056 
00057         /* create triangulator and set the points as the area */
00058         osg::ref_ptr<osgUtil::DelaunayTriangulator> trig = new osgUtil::DelaunayTriangulator();
00059         trig->setInputPointArray(points);
00060 
00061         /* create a triangular constraint */
00062         osg::Vec3Array* bounds = new osg::Vec3Array;
00063 //      bounds->push_back(osg::Vec3(-0.5f, -0.5f, 0));
00064 //      bounds->push_back(osg::Vec3(-0.5f, 0.5f, 0));
00065 //      bounds->push_back(osg::Vec3(0.5f, 0.5f, 0));
00066         bounds->push_back(osg::Vec3(-10.5f, -10.5f, 11.0));
00067         bounds->push_back(osg::Vec3(-10.5f, 10.5f, 10.0));
00068         bounds->push_back(osg::Vec3(10.5f, 10.5f, 0));
00069 //      bounds->push_back(osg::Vec3(0.5f, 0.5f, 0));
00070 
00071         osg::ref_ptr<osgUtil::DelaunayConstraint> constraint = new osgUtil::DelaunayConstraint;
00072         constraint->setVertexArray(bounds);
00073         constraint->addPrimitiveSet(new osg::DrawArrays(osg::PrimitiveSet::LINE_LOOP,0,3) );
00074 
00075         /* add constraint to triangulator */
00076         //trig->addInputConstraint(constraint.get());
00077 
00078         trig->triangulate();
00079 
00080         /* remove triangles from mesh */
00081         //trig->removeInternalTriangles(constraint.get());
00082 
00083 
00084 //      osg::Drawable  trig->getTriangles();
00085 
00086         osg::Geometry* gm = new osg::Geometry; //TODO better access of triangles
00087         gm->setVertexArray(points);
00088         gm->addPrimitiveSet(trig->getTriangles());
00089         osg::Vec4Array* colors = new osg::Vec4Array(1);
00090         colors->push_back(osg::Vec4(0,1,0,0.3));
00091         gm->setColorArray(colors);
00092         gm->setColorBinding(osg::Geometry::BIND_OVERALL);
00093 
00094         /* use EdgeCollector to re-extract triangles from mesh */
00095         osgUtil::EdgeCollector ec;
00096         ec.setGeometry(gm->asGeometry());
00097 //      std::iterator<osgUtil::EdgeCollector> iter = ec._triangleSet.iterator;
00098 
00099         /* loop through each triangle and print its vertex values */
00100 //      osg::ref_ptr<osgUtil::EdgeCollector::Triangle> triangle;
00101 //      for (int i = 0; i < 3; ++i) {
00102 //              triangle = (*ec._triangleSet)[i];
00103 //              std::cout << "TRIANGLE Points: ";
00104 //              std::cout << triangle->_p1->_vertex<< ", ";
00105 //              std::cout << triangle->_p2->_vertex<< ", ";
00106 //              std::cout << triangle->_p3->_vertex << "\n";
00107 //      }
00108         Point3D tmpVertex1;
00109         Point3D tmpVertex2;
00110         Point3D tmpVertex3;
00111         BOOST_FOREACH(osg::ref_ptr<osgUtil::EdgeCollector::Triangle> tri, ec._triangleSet) {
00112 //         std::cout << "TRIANGLE Points: ";
00113 //         std::cout << tri->_p1->_vertex._v[0] << " ";
00114 //         std::cout << tri->_p1->_vertex._v[1] << " ";
00115 //         std::cout << tri->_p1->_vertex._v[2] << ", ";
00116            tmpVertex1 = Point3D(tri->_p1->_vertex._v[0], tri->_p1->_vertex._v[1], tri->_p1->_vertex._v[2]);
00117 
00118 //         std::cout << tri->_p2->_vertex._v[0] << " ";
00119 //         std::cout << tri->_p2->_vertex._v[1] << " ";
00120 //         std::cout << tri->_p2->_vertex._v[2] << ", ";
00121            tmpVertex2 = Point3D(tri->_p2->_vertex._v[0], tri->_p2->_vertex._v[1], tri->_p2->_vertex._v[2]);
00122 
00123 //         std::cout << tri->_p3->_vertex._v[0] << " ";
00124 //         std::cout << tri->_p3->_vertex._v[1] << " ";
00125 //         std::cout << tri->_p3->_vertex._v[2] << " ";
00126            tmpVertex3 = Point3D(tri->_p3->_vertex._v[0], tri->_p3->_vertex._v[1], tri->_p3->_vertex._v[2]);
00127 //         std::cout << tri->_p1->_vertex << ", ";
00128 //         std::cout << tri->_p2->_vertex << ", ";
00129 //         std::cout << tri->_p3->_vertex << "\n";
00130 //         std::cout << std::endl;
00131 
00132            mesh->addTriangle(tmpVertex1, tmpVertex2, tmpVertex3);
00133         }
00134 }
00135 
00136 void DelaunayTriangulationOSG::generateMesh(PointCloud3D* pointCloud, ITriangleMesh* mesh) {
00137         triangulate(pointCloud, mesh);
00138 }
